Title: Highlander II: The Quickening
Writer: Gregory Widen (characters), Brian Clemens (story), William N. Panzer (story), Peter Bellwood (screenplay)
Actors: Christopher Lambert, Sean Connery, Virginia Madsen, Michael Ironside
Plot: The second "Highlander" movie, again with Christopher Lambert and Sean Connery. It's the year 2024 and all the ozone above Earth has gone. To protect people from dying, MacLeod helped in the construction of a giant "shield", several years ago. But, since there isn't left anyone Immortal after MacLeod's victory in the previous film, he has stopped being an Immortal himself. Now he is just an old man, until one day some other Immortals arrive on our planet. You see, the Immortals come from another planet...
